content: 2019 Singaporean TV series or program ***From Beijing to Moscow*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 北京到莫斯科) is an original [Toggle](/wiki/Toggle_(website)) 13-episode romance-mystery series starring [River Huang](/wiki/River_Huang), Jojo Goh, [Felicia Chin](/wiki/Felicia_Chin) and [Aloysius Pang](/wiki/Aloysius_Pang). It premiered on 13 June 2019 on [Toggle](/wiki/Toggle_(website)). This was Aloysius Pang's last drama before his death on 23 January that year. ## Plot Kaixiang ([River Huang](/wiki/River_Huang)) lost his memory after an accident. ## Cast - [River Huang](/wiki/River_Huang) as Kaixiang - Jojo Goh as Xiaoqi - [Felicia Chin](/wiki/Felicia_Chin) as Kloudiia - [Aloysius Pang](/wiki/Aloysius_Pang) as Kenneth ## Awards and nominations ### Asian Academy Creative Awards Asian Academy Creative Awards – Acting AwardsCategoryNomineesResultBest Actor[River Huang](/wiki/River_Huang)WonBest ActressJojo GohWonBest Sound—N/aWonBest Theme Song—N/aWonBest Drama—N/aWon ### [Star Awards 2021](/wiki/Star_Awards_2021) [Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards) – Acting AwardsAccoladesCategoryNomineesResult[Star Awards 2021](/wiki/Star_Awards_2021) Awards Ceremony 红星大奖2021颁奖礼Best Short-Form Drama Series*From Beijing to Moscow*Won ## Production *From Beijing to Moscow* was shot in a two-month road trip to China, Mongolia and Russia from August to October 2018. This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: From Beijing to Moscow
